Adult (A): Content that is generally recognized as appropriate only for or that is legally restricted to persons at least the age of majority in their region.
Mature (M): May not be suitable for children under the age of 17
Teen (T): May not be suitable for children under the age of 13

Adult (A): Extreme depictions of graphic violence appropriate only for or legally restricted to persons at least 18 years of age.
Mature (M): Frequent, intense or graphic cartoon, fantasy, or realistic violence
Teen (T): Mild to moderate cartoon, fantasy, or realistic violence

Adult (A): BlackBerry World will not accept apps with graphic nudity
General (G): Little or no sexual content, situations, or themes
Mature (M): Intense/Frequent sexual content, situations, or themes
Teen (T): Infrequent/Mild sexual content, situations, or themes

Adult (A): BlackBerry World will not accept Hate Speech
Content designed to encourage/promote drug or alcohol abuse, or content appropriate only for or that is legally restricted to persons at least 18 years of age
As permitted by law for persons at least 18 years of age
